Table of Contents

Namespace EnergyPerformance.Services

Classes

ActivationService

Activation Service. Performs required actions on application startup, including calling InitializeAsync methods for classes requiring asynchronous initialization.

CpuTrackerService

This class is responsible for tracking the current CPU usage and performing automatic or manual switching between energy profiles. It is a background service that runs on a separate thread and is executed periodically, on a per-second basis.

EnergyUsageFileService

Class that saves and reads energy usage data to/from LocalAppData storage.

LocalSettingsService

Service that provides access to local settings and acts as a container for getting and setting user's settings choices for other classes (Services, ViewModels and Models).

NavigationService
NavigationViewService
PageService
PeriodicDataSaverService

Hosted Service that saves the data in the EnergyUsageModel to a file every 5 minutes.

PowerMonitorService

Hosted Service that monitors the power usage of the system, with periodic reporting every second.

PowerMonitorService.UpdateVisitor

Visitor class used to update the hardware components of the system.

ThemeSelectorService

Class responsible for loading and saving user's preferred theme in settings, as well as applying it to the application at runtime.
